data.title: THE POSTMAN Signed
data.meta_description: Norwalk, CT. The Easton Press, 2019. The Easton Press. Very fine. Item #003675H A very fine copy bound in full leather by The Easton Press. Signed by the author David Brin. Notes, bookplate and Certificate of Authenticity laid in. No bumped corners to book or spine tips. Gold gilt edges are very clean and bright.
data.text:
Norwalk, CT. The Easton Press, 2019. The Easton Press. Very fine. Item #003675H

A very fine copy bound in full leather by The Easton Press. Signed by the author David Brin. Notes, bookplate and Certificate of Authenticity laid in. No bumped corners to book or spine tips. Gold gilt edges are very clean and bright.
